email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Wheat Shipment from Santos to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

I hope you're doing well. We are looking to ship 12,000 MT of wheat from Santos to Shanghai under CFR terms. Could you provide a suitable vessel and a freight quote?

Best regards,
Lucas Martin

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Wheat Shipment from Santos to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thanks for your inquiry. I can offer the vessel OCEAN HARMONY, DWT 85,000, LOA 220m. The freight rate is USD 48/MT with a laycan of Oct 10-15. Let me know if this works for you.

Best,
Sophia

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Wheat Shipment from Santos to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

Thanks for the quick response. USD 48/MT seems a bit high. Could you consider USD 45/MT? Also, what is the demurrage rate per day?

Best,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Wheat Shipment from Santos to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Lucas,

I can adjust the rate to USD 46/MT, which is the best I can do. The demurrage rate is USD 12,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you.

Best,
Sophia

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Wheat Shipment from Santos to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

USD 46/MT is acceptable. Please proceed with the booking and send over the contract. Thanks for your assistance.

Best regards,
Lucas

email_chain.subject: Confirmed: Wheat Shipment from Santos to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Lucas,

Great! The booking is confirmed. Here are the details:

Commodity: Wheat
Quantity: 12,000 MT
Load Port: Santos
Discharge Port: Shanghai
Incoterms: CFR
Vessel: OCEAN HARMONY
Freight: USD 46/MT
Laycan: Oct 10-15
Demurrage: USD 12,000/day pro rata.

I will send the contract shortly.

Best,
Sophia
